item.title: Women and doctors join for a candid discussion

item.description: Now, the Suncoast View fits into your day, no matter where life takes you.

item.description: Three men were arrested after it the pumps were manipulated, the sheriff’s office said.

item.description: “People are losing more weight than ever, it seems.”

item.description: The restaurant/retail concept is back in a new location.

item.title: Carter Layne sentenced to 20 years in shooting death of J.M. Feeney
item.description: At the sentencing hearing, the court heard witnesses asking for justice for both Feeney and Layne.

item.title: COVID-19 vaccine changes in effect; DeSantis pushes to eliminate mandates
item.description: The FDA narrowed approval of the new, updated COVID-19 vaccines only to people who are over 65 or younger people with certain health conditions.

item.title: Summer like weather continues as two systems tango in the tropics
DeSantis announces $50M charter school expansion in Miami with Success Academy
item.description: Officials said more than 1.4 million Florida students now participate in some form of school choice.

item.title: Two people were killed in a deadly collision on SR31 and Bermont Road
item.description: On Sept. 24, two vehicles were involved in a head-on collision — killing two people on State Road 31 and Bermont Road.
